name: Time Warp (W.I.P)
description:
Time Warp - An Atari Dungeon Crawler

Time Warp is a difficult dungeon crawler built with Construct 2 based on styles used by games on the Atari 2600. The project is currently work in progress, with many features yet to be implemented, enemies to be drawn out and bugs to be squashed, but updates should be fairly frequent.

Find a bug? Want a feature to be implemented? Comment on the suggestions/report thread on the discussion board. I'll consider it for a future update!

Current state: Playable, but buggy. Thanks to WideOpenGames, who run the Imperfect Jam, for making me finally put this game out publicly!
